4 Helpers #

4.1 Grid Utilities #

4.1.1 Contain #

Contain the content with a max-width

Examples
Default styling

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.contain--s - Small max-width

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.contain--m - Medium max-width

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.contain--l - Large max-width

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

<div class="box box--m box--gray">
	<div class="contain [modifier class]">
		<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
	</div>
</div>

Example

20%
35%
35%
10%
Left
Center
Right
<div class="lay lay--fixed lay--center lay--s style-layout-example">
	<div>33.33%</div>
	<div>33.33%</div>
	<div>33.33%</div>
</div>
<div class="lay lay--fixed lay--center lay--s style-layout-example">
	<div class="lay-w20">20%</div>
	<div>35%</div>
	<div>35%</div>
	<div class="lay-w10">10%</div>
</div>
<div class="lay lay--fixed lay--s style-layout-example">
	<div class="lay--left">Left</div>
	<div class="lay--center">Center</div>
	<div class="lay--right">Right</div>
</div>

4.3 Responsive off's #

Examples
Default styling
Hidden
.hidden--offMobile - Hidden except on mobile
Hidden
.hidden--offTablet - Hidden except on tablet
Hidden
.hidden--offDesktop - Hidden except on desktop
Hidden
<div class="hidden [modifier class]">Hidden</div>

4.4 Float layout #

Examples
Default styling
Left Right
.right--offMobile - Does not float on mobile
Left Right
.right--offTablet - Does not float on tablet
Left Right
.right--offDesktop - Does not float on desktop
Left Right
<span class="left [modifier class]">Left</span>
<span class="right [modifier class]">Right</span>

4.5 Video crop #

Wrap video elements with .videoCrop to make element responsive while keeping aspect ratio

Example
<div class="videoCrop">
	<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/isQYHncq-IY?hd=1&amp;rel=0&amp;vq=hd720" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
</div>

4.6 Distribute #

Spaced-out inline-block's

Example
Item Item Item Item 
<div class="dist">
	<span>Item</span>
	<span>Item</span>
	<span>Item</span>
	<span>Item</span>
</div>
